27 #ifndef _ShaderProgramSet_
28 #define _ShaderProgramSet_
29 
30 #include "OgreShaderPrerequisites.h"
31 #include "OgreGpuProgram.h"
32 
33 namespace Ogre {
34 namespace RTShader {
35 
46 class _OgreRTSSExport ProgramSet : public RTShaderSystemAlloc
47 {
48 
49  // Interface.
50 public:
52  ProgramSet();
53 
55  ~ProgramSet();
56 
58  Program* getCpuVertexProgram();
59 
61  Program* getCpuFragmentProgram();
62 
64  GpuProgramPtr getGpuVertexProgram();
65 
67  GpuProgramPtr getGpuFragmentProgram();
68 
69  // Protected methods.
70 protected:
71  void setCpuVertexProgram(Program* vsCpuProgram);
72  void setCpuFragmentProgram(Program* psCpuProgram);
73 
74  void setGpuVertexProgram(GpuProgramPtr vsGpuProgram);
75  void setGpuFragmentProgram(GpuProgramPtr psGpuProgram);
76 
77 
78  // Attributes.
79 protected:
80  // Vertex shader CPU program.
81  Program* mVSCpuProgram;
82  // Fragment shader CPU program.
83  Program* mPSCpuProgram;
84  // Vertex shader GPU program.
85  GpuProgramPtr mVSGpuProgram;
86  // Fragment shader CPU program.
87  GpuProgramPtr mPSGpuProgram;
88 
89 private:
90  friend class ProgramManager;
91  friend class TargetRenderState;
92 
93 };
94 
98 }
99 }
100 
101 #endif
